query: SELECT id, title, LEFT(description, 100) as short_desc, price, level FROM courses WHERE active = 1 ORDER BY id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT id, title, LEFT(description, 100) as short_desc, price, level FROM courses WHERE active = 1 ORDER BY id;
